text: This is a list of Old Sylvestrians, the alumni of St. Sylvester's College, Kandy, Sri Lanka. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%" |- ! style="width:*;" | Name ! style="width:65%;" class="unsortable" | Notability ! style="width:*;" class="unsortable" | Reference |- | | Vice-Chancellor of University of Peradeniya (2009–2012) | style="text-align:center;" | |- | | Puisne Justice of the Supreme Court of Sri Lanka (2013–present), Deputy Solicitor General (?-2013) | style="text-align:center;" | |- | | 1964 Olympic welterweight boxer, boxing referee (1944 -) | style="text-align:center;" | |- | | Admiral - Commander of the Navy (2012 - 2014) | style="text-align:center;" | |- | | Director-General of the Sri Lanka Broadcasting Corporation (1998 - ) | style="text-align:center;" | |- | | Governor of North Eastern Province (1993 - 1994) | style="text-align:center;" | |- | | Member of Parliament - Matara (2010–present) | style="text-align:center;" | |- | | Governor of Central Province (2005 - 2015) | style="text-align:center;" | |- | | Member of Parliament - Kandy (2015–present) | style="text-align:center;" | |- | | Member of Parliament - National List (1977-1989), Ambassador to Maldives, Ambassador to Italy | style="text-align:center;" | |- | | Member of Parliament - (1977-1989), Ambassador to Jordan (2011-2015) | style="text-align:center;" | |- | | Member of Parliament - Kegalle (1989-1994) | style="text-align:center;" | |- | | General - Chief of Staff Sri Lankan Army; first General Officer Commanding the Joint Operations Command; Secretary of Defence | style="text- align:center;" | |- | | Chief Minister of Uva Province (1988-1998), Member of Parliament - Welimada (1965-1970, 1977-1989) | style="text-align:center;" | |- | | Vice-Chancellor of Sabaragamuwa University (2014-2017) | style="text- align:center;" | |- | | Member of Parliament - National List (2015–present) | style="text-align:center;" | |} ==See also== * St. Sylvester's College ==References== == External links == * St. Sylvester's College OBA * St. Sylvester's College OBA St. Sylvester's College
title: List of St. Sylvester's College alumni
